'4
June 15, 1962
Mr. Lester W. Lindow
1735-fib Sales Street
Washington, D.C.
Dear Les:
Huzzah! Huzzahl And assorted Yay Teams!
Congratulations, Les, on successfully managing the
passage of the all-channel receiver legislation. Although
our interests and yours spring from different motives, we
are certainly united in our interest in this bill and are
agreed it will be a happy and benefifcial impact for broadÂ¬
casting .
Certainlyyou and your people deserve major credit for
this successful outcome, though we like to think our people
helped a bit, too. I enclose rough note to indicate we provided
an assist through our membership contacts.
Cordially,
WGH:pw
Enclosure
William G. Harley
